ExtendedSection.Title: Using categories when searching for content

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: When you add a content to a page, you select a file or you browse in a gallery, OpenCms shows a dialog that typically has a Categories tab. Via that tab you can select categories and if you click on Results, only resources with the chosen categories assigned are displayed.

Image.Title: When searching content, you can restrict the displayed contents by category
